Directed by: Norman Taurog Actors: Benny Rubin, Pert Kelton, Rex Lease Production Company: Tiffany Productions Release Date: 15 June 1930 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Revolving around a baseball team, one player lets his ego run his life, and in turn looses the girl he is dating (who happens to be the team's manager's daughter). The second player is more of a comic relief, he is a great pitcher but is terrible at catching. He in turn is dating a somewhat odd girl.
